title: Kothon Jar
description: Bowl (Kothon), ceramic, Etrusco-Corinthian, 625 B.C. cat. card dims H. 2-1/2\', d. (at top) 6-1/4\' d. (at foot) 2-7/8\' jar for scented water; terra cotta, black and red over cream, three ance handles, decorated with grazing antelopes and rosettes.
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
